name: Clan of Lions
description:
A young Lion awakens. He is the last known member of the legendary Zima Clan. All other members were wiped out in the great catastrophic event. You must help him navigate the wild safari landscape as he looks to rebuild. Cross over crocodile infested rivers, flight against cheetahs, hyenas, Elephants, Leopards, and other dangerous animals in this high action adventure simulator. This is not a typical animal simulator though . . .

In Clan of Lions, you enter into a world of adventure and magic as you build your group and dominate your enemies. The magic elements make this game very unique and we believe, best in class. Find your friends, rebuild your lioness clan, defeat all the enemies, climb to the top of the food chain, and win the game. Help Zima regain its dominance. The game is part adventure and part animal simulation. This adventure simulator will take you on an ultimate epic journey as you build your warrior clan, use your magic, construct your home, defend against enemies that attack, and ultimately defeat all the Super Bosses. Performance Note : This game will perform best on powerful devices. The 3D graphics are processor intensive.

Best Game Features:
-- Build your own Lion Clan
-- Crocodile, Leopard, Hyena, Cheetah, Elephant, and Snake enemies
-- Massive 3D Open World Safari Map
-- Dynamic weather including thunderstorms storms and wind
-- Ever changing time of day
-- 4 Magic Spells to unlock - Fireball, Invincibility, Lightning Bolt, and Healing
-- Map includes Caves, Mountains, and Rivers
-- 6 Giant bosses
-- 4 Enemy Clans to defeat
-- 6 Super Giant Ultra Bosses

Tips: Use the mini map to help you in the game. It shows the locations of clan members, bosses, magic books, and enemies. Use the mini map to find the members - "m", Bosses "B" and Books "b". Seek advice from your spirit guide - a ghostlike figure found near your home. As you defeat the bosses, more bosses will appear.

Find all the magic books to unlock the magical skills including: Healing Potion, Fireball, Lightning Bolt, and Invincibility. Earn adventure points by hunting and completing tasks. Use the points to upgrade your strength, stamina, and magic.

As you race across the huge Safari open 3D world, you may call the members when you need help against the enemies. Bosses include Snakes, Lion, Bear, Crocodile, Wolf, Attack eagles, and Foxes. Upgrade your powers to become more powerful, have stronger defense, and have stronger magical ability. This is ultimate animal simulation like you have never seen it.

If you like this app, be sure and check out our other 3D animal simulators. We understand that the game is by no means perfect and we welcome your constructive criticism. Please email your suggestions.

Evolved is a new series of games we are creating at Wild Foot. We'd really like to hear from you. So far the response has been good, so we will continue making apps of this style.
